name: MIT
description: Experience, a concentration of knowledge and the ability to avoid most recruiting mistakes. We know what most local and foreign companies want and we can give it to you. And we are constantly improving our programming courses, adding something new there. You can see the success stories of our alumni for yourself to see the effectiveness of our teaching methodology. Yes, we will start with the basics and the most basic information. We know that most people come to us with zero knowledge.

department.name: Faculty of Computer Science
department.description: The Faculty of Computer Science offers a wide range of computer science programs and research opportunities.
department.history: Founded in 1985, the Faculty of Computer Science has a rich history of academic excellence.

department.name: Faculty of Automation
department.description: The Faculty of Automation specializes in automation engineering and robotics.
department.history: Established in 1990, the Faculty of Automation has a strong tradition of innovation.

department.name: Faculty of Neural Networks
department.description: The Faculty of Neural Networks focuses on neural network research and artificial intelligence.
department.history: Founded in 2001, the Faculty of Neural Networks is a leader in AI education and research.
